## I. From model 15b

Islands groups are separate (with 200m-threshold), parameters are shared among islands groups.

Includes two first PC axis and interactins among species (on colonization & extinction)

### I.1. Basal rates

pd_plot <- plot_grid(
  ggplot(df[df$parameter %in% c('d'),], aes(`50%`, x=species))+

    labs(x = "")+
    annotation_custom(ggplotGrob(dec_exp), xmin = 1., xmax = 3.5, ymin = 25, ymax = 50),

)

ggsave(scaled_rates, filename = "./figures/base_demo_rescaled.jpeg", height = 4, width = 7.5, dpi = 600)

    scale_y_continuous(limits = c(0,0.5))+
    theme(legend.position = c(0.6,0.85),

ncol = 1, labels = c("","C"))
base_param

upperLimit_col = .4

colpalette = c("#a1d99b","#00441b")

plot_prob_PCA_space = function(dt, tit, lim, l = colpalette[1], h = colpalette[2]){
  ggplot(dt, aes(V2,V3, color= 1-exp(-1*(V1))))+geom_point()+
  labs(title=tit)+
  scale_color_continuous(low = l, high = h, limits = lim)+
    # scale_color_gradient()+
  labs(color = "Prob.")+
  theme()+labs(y="PC2",x="PC1")+
    scale_x_reverse()+
    scale_y_reverse()
}

## Percent of habitat available for each species
npools = length(alM[,1])

allExpect = data.frame(magna = alM[,1],
                       pulex = alP[,1],
                       longi = alL[,1],
                       PC1 = alM[,2],
                       PC2 = alM[,3])

# Unavailable pools for each species
1 - apply(allExpect[,1:3], 2, FUN = function(x) sum(x>0)/length(x))

## Total fraction on unsuitable pools for species alltogether
sum(allExpect$magna==0 & allExpect$pulex==0 & allExpect$longi==0) / npools

# In the data
length(which(magna_envt$magna_1==0 & magna_envt$magna_2==0)) / npools
length(which(pulex_envt$pulex_1==0 & pulex_envt$pulex_2==0)) / npools
length(which(longi_envt$longi_1==0 & longi_envt$longi_2==0)) / npools

length(intersect(intersect(which(magna_envt$magna_1==0 & magna_envt$magna_2==0), which(pulex_envt$pulex_1==0 & pulex_envt$pulex_2==0)), which(longi_envt$longi_1==0 & longi_envt$longi_2==0))) / npools
